website_summaries.verdict: Solidly built scoreboard that's offered at a reasonable price versus some other electronic indoor scoreboards.
pros: Uses red, green, and yellow numbers to make it easy to distinguish the information
Clock can count up or down from 99:99, while the board tracks score up to 199 points
Only weighs 11.3 lbs., so you can store it easily or carry it to any game location
cons: Smaller than other digital boards at just 15" by 22"
No option to run from batteries

customer_reviews.title: We had high hopes. :(
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 6 scoreboards andnit did not go as planned. Upon opening the first one it looked like it had been used. There were scratches on the buttons. We couldn't figure out how to get the scoreboard to light up. We watched youtube videos and read the directions over and over. It seems as though the led lights were broken. We spent about 2 frusterating hours messing with all 6 boards and only one of the 6 seemed to work properly. We called number for customer service and had to leave a voicemail. We are returning these boards. We had high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: this scoreboard didn't work on the big screen when I opened the box. also, you can hear something rattling around in there. no problem!! opened up the back and found two ribbon cables that had come unplugged during shipping. plugged them in and away we went. this thing is awesome indeed!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Powers

customer_reviews.title: We bought two of these last November for a church ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these last November for a church youth basketball league. They performed flawlessly every night for three games a night. We will definitely invest in more of these next season.
customer_reviews.author: William Webber

customer_reviews.title: Returned due to malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because the lower half didn't light up. I called support, had to leave a message, nobody responded. So back it went.
customer_reviews.author: DenverDavid

customer_reviews.title: Game Time!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this clock. We are able to get more games in and being able to know how much time is left in the game by a glance makes it easier to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our church youth basketball tournament. Everybody loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It met our needs.
customer_reviews.text: It met all our needs including easy operations. If I had to add anything, it would be to add gripping pads to the bottom to prevent sliding when punching the keyboard. OH and having a secure carrying case option. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Great economical score clock. Couple things with resetting time I would like better if it was easier to reset, and it may be my own ineptness. But compared to what other score clocks are priced this is more than reasonable and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My scoreboard I received had a crack in it. ...
customer_reviews.text: My scoreboard I received had a crack in it. It did work and the i want to send it back but I need it and it would take to long to receive another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike  Brown

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service helped
customer_reviews.text: Home and Guest were switched by the manufacturer so points are given to the opposite teams! Customer service contacted us immediately about complaint and provided quick & simple fix.
customer_reviews.author: Chasbo Hendu

customer_reviews.title: Must Read
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase!!! The Scoreboard operates as advertised. Can be used for multiple sports. I found a new business vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my indoor youth basketball league. Work just liked described. Went through a whole season with no problems. GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money shipping back defective product.
customer_reviews.text: This scoreboard was defective when received. The score buttons didn't work, and it had to be returned. Cost a fortune to send back. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennmenz

customer_reviews.title: Great scoreboard
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very portable and useful for many types of sports. My son absolutely loves it! Only thing missing is a wireless remote.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product
customer_reviews.text: The sportable is amazing. I use it for my bball leagues and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood Heady

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could vote no stars because it didn’t even work.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Miller III

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The second time I used it a section of lights were out.
customer_reviews.author: William Brown

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could return them as there are a few things I don't like the quarters automatically change which is a problem when ...
customer_reviews.text: I just bought two of these for our basketball league and have purchase other brands of these.I wish I could return them as there are a few things I don't like the quarters automatically change which is a problem when you have halftime as when the horn goes off it automatically goes to the 4th quarter, some of buttons also stick on both of them there is also no button to clear the score so you have to do it manually for both home and.
customer_reviews.author: James Wayne Wimp

customer_reviews.title: works great, just two suggestions
customer_reviews.text: works great, just two suggestions; 1.- need to provide cards on how to operate for a soccer game and to the hability to use batteries
customer_reviews.author: Vicente Mora

customer_reviews.title: Yes, Yes, Yes.  Finally a scoreboard worth having!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! As an Upward Basketball league director, this is exactly what I was looking for. Fantastic product and fast shipping. You can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, can barely see the LED in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, can barely see the LED in the indoor gym, there is also something lose inside. I used it once and put it back to the box and returned it right away
customer_reviews.author: andre cuyugan

customer_reviews.title: We bought these for our youth wrestling tournament. They ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our youth wrestling tournament. They arrived early and worked very well. No complaints at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, I am a HS Athletic Director the product was as advertised and delivered ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: One time use and died!
customer_reviews.text: Used one time, front displays on both units stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sportable Scoreboards Multisport Indoor Tabletop Scoreboard
feature_bullets: Lightweight design for easy transport. Recommended for use indoors.
Scores basketball, wrestling, volleyball, boxing and more. 22Wx15Hx8 deep
Clock counts up to or down from 99:99 and scores to 199.
Includes period, bonus, and possession indicators. Features workout/practice and circuit timer modes.
Yellow, red and green LED displays are 4”. Scoreboard has a loud built-in horn.
